thread.title: Could ice cream soon be made to melt more slowly?

title: Could ice cream soon be made to melt more slowly?
text:
Could ice cream soon be made to melt more slowly? 
Published By: Mashable - Today 
Indulging in an ice cream cone on a hot summer day can be a refreshing but sticky treat. Now, scientists are trying to take some of the mess...
